description: head and torso of standing man from PL, with a dark Van Dyke beard, wearing a dark jacket and a green fedora, holding a large painter's pallet and a cluster of paintbrushes in her PL hand; painting of a standing girl with a white cap and apron in an elaborate frame at left; colorful images of dancing women in turquoise and coral colored clothing behind man
signed: LRC, in dark green: Albert Launay / 03 [?]
title: The Painter in His Studio
